function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Frequent travel to different cities for real estate tours","Impact":"Potential exposure to contagious diseases during travel","Mitigation":"Utilize virtual site tours to reduce the need for physical travel","Technologies":"Virtual tour software, video conferencing tools","People":"Real estate agents, customers","Owner":"Real estate office owners"},{"Description":"Facial recognition and photo processing software usage in public digital environments","Impact":"Potential misuse of personal photos and data, privacy concerns","Mitigation":"Implement strict privacy policies and data protection measures","Technologies":"Encryption, privacy settings, data access controls","People":"Individuals whose photos are processed, photographers, studios","Owner":"Image recognition and processing business owners"},{"Description":"Offering distant X-ray processing software for medical diagnosis","Impact":"Potential misdiagnosis or errors in medical diagnosis","Mitigation":"Thorough testing, validation, and quality control processes for the software","Technologies":"Medical imaging software, AI algorithms, validation tools","People":"Medical professionals, patients","Owner":"Image recognition and processing business owners"}]}
